mapper.insert: insert into weibo_user (id, tags, gender, place, signature, birthday, sex_orientation, edu_info, marriage, work_info, nickname, follow_num, fans_num, tweet_num, head) VALUES (#{id}, #{tags}, #{gender}, #{place}, #{signature}, #{birthday},#{sexOrientation}, #{eduInfo}, #{marriage}, #{workInfo}, #{nickname}, #{followNum}, #{fansNum}, #{tweetNum}, #{head})
mapper.select: select ifnull(exists(select 1 from weibo_user where id = #{id}), 0);
select weibo_user.* from weibo_user, (select uid from weibo_tweet where id = #{tweetId}) t where id = t.uid;
